pkgmetadata.longdescription: Guided Correction Approach for Inherited bias (GCAI.bias) // Many inherited biases and effects exists in RNA-seq due to both biological and technical effects. We observed the biological variance of testing target transcripts can influence the yield of sequencing reads, which might indicate a resource competition existing in RNA-seq. We developed this package to capture the bias depending on local sequence and perform the correction of this type of bias by borrowing information from spike-in measurement.
